text: Third Raid on Banu Thalabah took place in September, 627AD, 6th month of 6AH of the Islamic calendarNote: Book contains a list of battles of Muhammad in Arabic, English translation available here In Jumada Ath-Thania, Zaid as the commander of 15 men raided Bani Tha‘labah and captured 20 of their camels but the tribe members had fled. He spent four days there and then returned to Medina. The First Raid on Banu Thalabah had taken place two months earlier. ==Islamic Primary sources== This event is mentioned in Ibn Sa'd, Kitab al- tabaqat al-kabir, Volume 2 ==See also== *Military career of Muhammad *List of expeditions of Muhammad ==Notes== Category:627 Category:Campaigns ordered by Muhammad
title: Third Raid on Banu Thalabah
